title: Top stocks in focus on Monday: From Ruchi Soya to Tech Mahindra - Key highlights - Mint
content: Top stocks in focus on Monday: From Ruchi Soya to Tech Mahindra - Key highlights  Mint
description: The week ahead, markets are set to be focused on inflation data, major central banks policy announcements, and weekly F&O expiry..Last week, domestic equities picked up momentum shrugging off uncertainties arising from Russia-Ukraine.
